value.name: Dayton man indicted in connection to robbery where accomplice was killed
value.description: Prosecuting Attorney Mat Heck, Jr. announced that Robert Brooks, 32, of Dayton, has been indicted on counts in connection to a robbery in which an accomplice, Kato Knight, was killed.
